Class AbstractWebBrowser<N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.webapi.dom.impl.AbstractWebBrowser<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - Original web browser enclosed (wrapped) by this class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, MiniBrowser, WebBrowser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WebDriverBrowserImpl

extends Object
implements WebBrowser
